text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Erfurt, Germany, at Steigerwaldstadion on 14 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Radosław Popławski ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Halil Akkaş ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Pieter Desmet ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
